blocks.name: gsumval3a
blocks.content: Value of the group sum operation over an index set with finite support. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 29-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumval3a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c7, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c6, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c1, csupp, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c7, crn(cfz))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), wceq(c6, cfv(ccntz, c0)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c6, crn(c1)))))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c7))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c8))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))))), diffsc(s1, c7))
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))), cif(c5, cif(cio(s0, wex(hs2, wrex(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs2), cfz, cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(cv(hs2), c3, c1), cv(hs3))))))), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))), wcel(c7, crn(cfz))), wss(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))), cif(cio(s0, wex(hs2, wrex(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs2), cfz, cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(cv(hs2), c3, c1), cv(hs3))))))), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))), wcel(c7, crn(cfz))), w0)
  gsumval(s0, hs2, hs3, s1, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), c5, c7, c3, c2, c4, cmnd, c8, w0)
  3eqtrd(c2, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))), co(c1, csupp, c5), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c5))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c2, co(c1, csupp, c5)))
  sylancl(w0, wceq(co(c1, csupp, c5), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c5)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wa(wf(c1, c7, c4), wcel(c7, c8)))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c5)), cdif(universe, crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))), w0)
  difeq2d(universe, csn(c5), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), w0)
  eqcomd(csn(c5), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), w0)
  iffalsed(c5, cif(cio(s0, wex(hs2, wrex(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs2), cfz, cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(cv(hs2), c3, c1), cv(hs3))))))), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))), wcel(c7, crn(cfz))), w0, wss(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))))
  mpd(w0, wn(wss(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))), wne(c2, emptycls))
  necon3ad(c2, emptycls, w0, wss(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))))
  sylbid(w0, wss(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))), wceq(c2, emptycls), wss(crn(c1), csn(c5)))
  sseq2d(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), csn(c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), csn(c5)), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  gsumvallem2(hs0, hs1, c0, crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), c5, c4, c3)
  eqid(crab(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))
  ex(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5)), wceq(c2, emptycls))

  a1i(wa(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5))), wceq(c2, co(c1, csupp, c5)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5))), wceq(co(c1, csupp, c5), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c5)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl(wa(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5))), wcel(c1, universe), wa(wf(c1, c7, c4), wcel(c7, c8)))
  adantr(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5)), wa(wf(c1, c7, c4), wcel(c7, c8)))
  jca(w0, wf(c1, c7, c4), wcel(c7, c8))
  fex(c1, c7, c4, c8)
  fvexi(c5, c0g, c0)
  suppimacnv(c1, universe, c5, universe)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5))), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c5))), emptycls), wf(c1, c7, csn(c5)), wceq(cin(csn(c5), cdif(universe, csn(c5))), emptycls))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5))), wf(c1, c7, csn(c5)), wfn(c1, c7), wss(crn(c1), csn(c5)))
  adantr(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5)), wfn(c1, c7))
  ffnd(c1, c7, c4, w0)
  simpr(w0, wss(crn(c1), csn(c5)))
  df-f(c1, c7, csn(c5))
  disjdif(csn(c5), universe)
  fimacnvdisj(c1, c7, csn(c5), cdif(universe, csn(c5)))
  iffalsed(cio(s0, wex(hs2, wrex(hs3, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs2), cfz, cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(cv(hs2), c3, c1), cv(hs3))))))), cio(s0, wex(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(s1))), cfv(chash, c2)))))), w0, wcel(c7, crn(cfz)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)

thm gsumval3a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2))))))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c7 → c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c1)⊆(c6 ` ran(c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ c2 =(c1[supp]c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c7 ∈ ran(...))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), c6 =(Cntz ` c0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), (w0 → ran(c1)⊆(c6 ` ran(c1))))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), (w0 → c2 ∈ Fin))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c7))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s0, c8))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), d(s1, c7))
  3eqtrd((c0[gsum]c1), iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2))))), if(ran(c1)⊆ { hs0 ∈ c4 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,((hs0[c3]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[c3]hs0)= hs1))}, c5, if(c7 ∈ ran(...), iota(s0, ∃(hs2, ∃(hs3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c7 =(hs2[...]hs3)∧ s0 =(seq(hs2(c3, c1))` hs3))))), iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2))))))), if(c7 ∈ ran(...), iota(s0, ∃(hs2, ∃(hs3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(c7 =(hs2[...]hs3)∧ s0 =(seq(hs2(c3, c1))` hs3))))), iota(s0, ∃(s1,((s1 :(1[...](# ` c2))↔ c2)∧ s0 =(seq(1(c3,(c1 ∘ s1)))`(# ` c2)))))), w0)
  gsumval(s0, hs2, hs3, s1, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, { hs0 ∈ c4 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,((hs0[c3]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[c3]hs0)= hs1))}, c5, c7, c3, c2, c4, cmnd, c8, w0)
  3eqtrd(c2, (`' c1 "(𝕌 \ { hs0 ∈ c4 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,((hs0[c3]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[c3]hs0)= hs1))})), (c1[supp]c5), (`' c1 "(𝕌 \ { c5 })), w0)
  a1i(w0, c2 =(c1[supp]c5))
  sylancl(w0, (c1[supp]c5)=(`' c1 "(𝕌 \ { c5 })), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c5 ∈ 𝕌)

blocks.name: gsumval3eu
blocks.content: The group sum as defined in ~ gsumval3a is uniquely defined. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Dec-2014.)

thm gsumcllem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 = ∅)→ c1 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 → c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1[supp]c3)⊆ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(c1, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ c0 = ∅))
  adantr(w0, c0 = ∅, c1 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1 ` s0)))
  feqmptd(s0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c2, (c1 ` s0), c3, (w0 ∧ c0 = ∅))
  anassrs(w0, c0 = ∅, s0 ∈ c2, (c1 ` s0)= c3)
  sylan2(w0, (c0 = ∅ ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (c1 ` s0)= c3, s0 ∈(c2 \ c0))
  biimpar(c0 = ∅, s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(c2 \ c0))
  eleq2d(s0, (c2 \ c0), c2, c0 = ∅)
  syl6eq((c2 \ c0), c2, (c2 \ ∅), c0 = ∅)
  difeq2(c0, emptycls, c2)
  dif0(c2)
  suppssr(s0, c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 = ∅)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: gsumzcl2
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum. This theorem has a weaker hypothesis than ~ gsumzcl , because it is not required that ` F ` is a function (actually, the hypothesis always holds for any proper class ` F ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 1-Jun-2019.)

  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c4, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(c1, csupp, c3), cfn))

  f1ofo(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c3))), co(c1, csupp, c3))

  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c3)), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c3))), co(c1, csupp, c3))), wf(c1, c5, c2))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c3)), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c3))), co(c1, csupp, c3)))), wf(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c3))), c5), wf1(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c3))), c5))

thm gsumzcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c5 → c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c1)⊆(c4 ` ran(c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1[supp]c3)∈ Fin)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, (c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2, (c1[supp]c3)= ∅, ((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧ ∃(hs0,(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))))
  ex(w0, (c1[supp]c3)= ∅, (c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)

  eqtrd((c0[gsum]c1), c3, (c0[gsum](hs1 ∈ c5 ↦ c3)), (w0 ∧(c1[supp]c3)= ∅))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, c1, (hs1 ∈ c5 ↦ c3), (w0 ∧(c1[supp]c3)= ∅))
  gsumcllem(hs1, (c1[supp]c3), c1, c5, c3, c2, c6, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c0)
  ssidd((c1[supp]c3), w0)
  adantr(w0, (c1[supp]c3)= ∅, (c0[gsum](hs1 ∈ c5 ↦ c3))= c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[gsum](hs1 ∈ c5 ↦ c3))= c3, c0 ∈ Mnd, c5 ∈ c6)
  gsumz(hs1, c0, c5, c6, c3)
  adantr(w0, (c1[supp]c3)= ∅, c3 ∈ c2)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  mndidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  expimpd(w0, (# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ, ∃(hs0,(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3))), (c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  exlimdv(hs0, (w0 ∧(# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)), (c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  expr(w0, (# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ, (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)), (c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  eqeltrd((c0[gsum]c1), c2, (seq(1((+ ` c0),(c1 ∘ hs0)))`(# `(c1[supp]c3))), (w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))))
  gsumval3(c0, c1, (+ ` c0), hs0, (# `(c1[supp]c3)), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, ((c1 ∘ hs0)[supp]c3), (w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))))
  adantr(w0, ((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3))), c5 ∈ c6)
  adantr(w0, ((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3))), ran(c1)⊆(c4 ` ran(c1)))
  syl5sseqr((c1[supp]c3), ran(hs0), (c1[supp]c3), (w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))))
  ssid((c1[supp]c3))
  ad2antll(w0, (# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ, (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)), ran(hs0)=(c1[supp]c3))
  syl((hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)), ran(hs0)=(c1[supp]c3), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↠(c1[supp]c3)))
  f1ofo(hs0, (1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3))), (c1[supp]c3))
  forn(hs0, (1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3))), (c1[supp]c3))
  eqid(((c1 ∘ hs0)[supp]c3))
  seqcl(hs1, hs2, nat1, (+ ` c0), (c1 ∘ hs0), (# `(c1[supp]c3)), c2, (w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))))
  syl6eleq((# `(c1[supp]c3)), (ℤ≥ ` 1), cn, (w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))))
  simprl(w0, (# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ, (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))
  nnuz()
  ffvelrnda(hs1, (1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3))), (c1 ∘ hs0), c2, (w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))), ((c1 ∘ hs0):(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))→ c2), (c1 : c5 → c2), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))→ c5))
  adantr(w0, ((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3))), (c1 : c5 → c2))
  syl((w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))→ c5), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↣ c5))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↣ c5), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↣(c1[supp]c3)), (c1[supp]c3)⊆ c5)
  ad2antll(w0, (# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ, (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)), (hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↣(c1[supp]c3)))
  f1of1(hs0, (1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3))), (c1[supp]c3))
  adantr(w0, ((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3))), (c1[supp]c3)⊆ c5)
  fssdm((c1[supp]c3), c5, c1, c2, w0)
  suppssdm(c1, c3)
  f1ss(hs0, (1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3))), (c1[supp]c3), c5)
  f1f(hs0, (1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3))), c5)
  fco(c1, c5, c2, hs0, (1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3))))
  sylan((w0 ∧((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3)))), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2), (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  adantr(w0, ((# `(c1[supp]c3))∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# `(c1[supp]c3)))↔(c1[supp]c3))), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  3expb(c0 ∈ Mnd, hs1 ∈ c2, hs2 ∈ c2, (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ c2)

blocks.name: gsumzcl
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 1-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumzcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c4, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c3))
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  fsuppimpd(c1, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumzcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c5 → c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c1)⊆(c4 ` ran(c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[finSupp]c3)
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  fsuppimpd(c1, c3, w0)
}

  eqcomd(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), co(c1, csupp, c4), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wceq(co(c1, csupp, c4), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  suppimacnv(c1, universe, c4, universe)
  ad2antll(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4)), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4))), co(c1, csupp, c4)), wceq(crn(cv(hs0)), co(c1, csupp, c4)))
  syl(wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4))), co(c1, csupp, c4)), wceq(crn(cv(hs0)), co(c1, csupp, c4)), wfo(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4))), co(c1, csupp, c4)))
  f1ofo(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4))), co(c1, csupp, c4))

  eqtri(cima(ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), cima(ccnv(c2), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), cima(ccom(ccnv(c2), ccnv(c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c4))))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c4)), ccom(ccnv(c2), ccnv(c1)))

  rnco2(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4)), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4))), co(c1, csupp, c4))), wb(wss(co(ccom(c1, c2), csupp, c4), crn(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)))), wss(cima(ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), crn(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))))))
  sseq1d(co(ccom(c1, c2), csupp, c4), crn(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wceq(co(ccom(c1, c2), csupp, c4), cima(ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), wcel(ccom(c1, c2), universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c1, c2), universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wf(c1, c6, c3), wcel(c6, c7))

  coexg(c1, universe, c2, universe)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)

  eqid(co(ccom(ccom(c1, c2), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), csupp, c4))
  3syl(w0, wo(wceq(co(c1, csupp, c4), emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4)), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, co(c1, csupp, c4))), co(c1, csupp, c4))))), wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c1, csupp, c4), cfn))
  simprd(wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4), wcel(co(c1, csupp, c4), cfn), wfun(c1))

blocks.name: gsumres
blocks.content: Extend a finite group sum by padding outside with zeroes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c1, csupp, c4), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4))
} = {
  gsumzres(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(ccntz, c0), c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), c3, c0, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](c1 |` c2))=(c0[gsum]c1))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c5 → c3))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1[supp]c4)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[finSupp]c4)
} = {
  gsumzres(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Cntz ` c0), c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, (Cntz ` c0), c3, c0, c5, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
}

blocks.name: gsumcl2
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum. This theorem has a weaker hypothesis than ~ gsumcl , because it is not required that ` F ` is a function (actually, the hypothesis always holds for any proper class ` F ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(c1, csupp, c3), cfn))
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(ccntz, c0), c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), c2, c0, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c4 → c2))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1[supp]c3)∈ Fin)
} = {
  gsumzcl2(c0, c1, c2, c3, (Cntz ` c0), c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, (Cntz ` c0), c2, c0, c4, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
}

blocks.name: gsumcl
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: gsumf1o
blocks.content: Re-index a finite group sum using a bijection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c2, c7, c5))
} = {
  gsumzf1o(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(ccntz, c0), c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), c3, c0, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum](c1 ∘ c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c5 → c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[finSupp]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c7 ↔ c5))
} = {
  gsumzf1o(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Cntz ` c0), c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, (Cntz ` c0), c3, c0, c5, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
}

blocks.name: gsumzsubmcl
blocks.content: Closure of a group sum in a submonoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumzsubmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c4, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c3))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2)), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd)))
  3eltr4d(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, co(co(c0, cress, c2), cgsu, c1), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)), w0)
  gsumzcl(co(c0, cress, c2), c1, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)), cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2)), cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), c5, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cress, c2), cmnd), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  submmnd(c2, c0, co(c0, cress, c2))
  mpbid(w0, wf(c1, c5, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2))), wf(c1, c5, c2))
  feq3d(c1, c5, c2, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2)), w0)
  sseqtr4d(crn(c1), cfv(cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), crn(c1)), cin(cfv(c4, crn(c1)), c2), w0)
  ssind(crn(c1), cfv(c4, crn(c1)), c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), crn(c1)), cin(cfv(c4, crn(c1)), c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wss(crn(c1), c2))
  frnd(c1, c2, c5, w0)
  resscntz(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0), crn(c1), cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)), c4, co(c0, cress, c2), c0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, co(c0, cress, c2)))
  breqtrd(c1, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2)), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, co(c0, cress, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  subm0(c2, c0, c3, co(c0, cress, c2))
  gsumsubm(c0, c1, co(c0, cress, c2), c5, c6, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  submbas(c2, c0, co(c0, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(c0, cress, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumzsubmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c5 → c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c1)⊆(c4 ` ran(c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[finSupp]c3)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2), (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd))
  3eltr4d((c0[gsum]c1), c2, ((c0[|`s]c2)[gsum]c1), (Base `(c0[|`s]c2)), w0)
  gsumzcl((c0[|`s]c2), c1, (Base `(c0[|`s]c2)), (0 `(c0[|`s]c2)), (Cntz `(c0[|`s]c2)), c5, c6, w0)
  eqid((Base `(c0[|`s]c2)))
  eqid((0 `(c0[|`s]c2)))
  syl(w0, (c0[|`s]c2)∈ Mnd, c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  submmnd(c2, c0, (c0[|`s]c2))
  mpbid(w0, (c1 : c5 →(Base `(c0[|`s]c2))), (c1 : c5 → c2))
  feq3d(c1, c5, c2, (Base `(c0[|`s]c2)), w0)
  sseqtr4d(ran(c1), ((Cntz `(c0[|`s]c2))` ran(c1)), ((c4 ` ran(c1))⋂ c2), w0)
  ssind(ran(c1), (c4 ` ran(c1)), c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((Cntz `(c0[|`s]c2))` ran(c1))=((c4 ` ran(c1))⋂ c2), c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0), ran(c1)⊆ c2)
  frnd(c1, c2, c5, w0)
  resscntz(c2, (SubMnd ` c0), ran(c1), (Cntz `(c0[|`s]c2)), c4, (c0[|`s]c2), c0)
  eqid((Cntz `(c0[|`s]c2)))
  breqtrd(c1, cfsupp, (0 `(c0[|`s]c2)), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 =(0 `(c0[|`s]c2)), c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  subm0(c2, c0, c3, (c0[|`s]c2))
  gsumsubm(c0, c1, (c0[|`s]c2), c5, c6, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 =(Base `(c0[|`s]c2)), c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  submbas(c2, c0, (c0[|`s]c2))
  eqid((c0[|`s]c2))
}

blocks.name: gsumsubmcl

thm gsumsubmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

thm gsumsubmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)

blocks.name: gsumsubgcl
blocks.content: Closure of a group sum in a subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumsubgcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c3))
} = {
  gsumsubmcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c0, cabl))
  ablcmn(c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  subgsubm(c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumsubgcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c4 → c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[finSupp]c3)

  syl(w0, c0 ∈ CMnd, c0 ∈ Abel)
  ablcmn(c0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c0), c2 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  subgsubm(c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: gsumsplit
blocks.content: Split a group sum into two parts. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 5-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(co(c0, cgsu, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cgsu, cres(c1, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c7, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c4), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c7, cun(c2, c4)))
} = {
  gsumzsplit(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, cfv(ccntz, c0), c7, c8, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), c5, c0, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)=((c0[gsum](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[gsum](c1 |` c4))))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c7 → c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[finSupp]c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋂ c4)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 =(c2 ⋃ c4))
} = {
  gsumzsplit(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, (Cntz ` c0), c7, c8, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  cntzcmnf(c1, (Cntz ` c0), c5, c0, c7, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
}

thm gsumsplit2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c5, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c3, c5), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cun(c3, c5)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c5, c2))), co(co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c5))), w0)
  gsumsplit(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c1, c8, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, c6, w0)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c5)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c5, c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3), cmpt(s0, c3, c2), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c1, cun(c3, c5), w0)
  ssun1(c3, c5)

  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c5, c1, cun(c3, c5), w0)

thm gsumsplit2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2))[c4](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2))))
  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)[finSupp]c7)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 ⋂ c5)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(c3 ⋃ c5))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2))[c4](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2))), ((c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c3))[c4](c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c5))), w0)
  gsumsplit(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c1, c8, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, c6, w0)
  oveq12d((c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c3)), c4, (c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c5)), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2)), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c3), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c1, (c3 ⋃ c5), w0)
  ssun1(c3, c5)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c5), (s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c5, c1, (c3 ⋃ c5), w0)
  ssun2(c5, c3)
}

thm gsummptfidmsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

blocks.name: gsumconstf
blocks.content: Sum of a constant series. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumconstf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(cfv(chash, c1), c4, c2)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(cfv(chash, c1), c4, c2), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)))
  oveq2i(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(hs0, c1, c2))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  eqidd(c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  gsumconst(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)

} = {

blocks.name: gsummhm
blocks.content: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c3, cgsu, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, cmhm, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c5))
} = {
  gsumzmhm(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(ccntz, c3), c6, c7, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cmnd), wcel(c3, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c3)
  cntzcmnf(c2, cfv(ccntz, c3), c4, c3, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](c1 ∘ c2))=(c1 `(c3[gsum]c2)))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c3[MndHom]c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c6 → c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[finSupp]c5)
} = {
  gsumzmhm(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Cntz ` c3), c6, c7, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ Mnd, c3 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c3)
  cntzcmnf(c2, (Cntz ` c3), c4, c3, c6, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c3))
}

blocks.content: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum, mapping version with implicit substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)

thm gsummhm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cmhm, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c9, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c9), cfsupp, c6))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c9), wceq(c8, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))), wceq(c8, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9))), cfv(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))), w0)
  gsummhm(c0, cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9), c5, c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9)), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  fmptco(s0, s1, cmpt(s1, c4, c8), cmpt(s0, c1, c9), c1, c2, c9, c4, c8, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c1, c9), w0)

  fvmptd3(s1, cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9)), c3, c4, c8, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  rspcdva(s1, co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9)), c4, w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c8, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  eleq1d(c8, cfv(cbs, c0), c3, wceq(cv(s1), co(c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c8, cfv(cbs, c0))), wf(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl(w0, wf(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), c4, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), co(c5, cmhm, c0)))
  mhmf(cmpt(s1, c4, c8), c5, c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  fmpt(s1, c4, c8, cfv(cbs, c0), cmpt(s1, c4, c8))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c4, c8))
  gsumcl(c5, cmpt(s0, c1, c9), c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c9, c4, w0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c5, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c9))

}

thm gsummhm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ CMnd)

  ⊣ (w0 →(s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8)∈(c5[MndHom]c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c9 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9)[finSupp]c6)
  ⊣ (s1 = c9 → c8 = c2)
  ⊣ (s1 =(c5[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9))→ c8 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c9)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), c3, (c0[gsum]((s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8)∘(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9))), ((s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8)`(c5[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9))), w0)
  gsummhm(c0, (s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9), c5, c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8)∘(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9)), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), w0)
  fmptco(s0, s1, (s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9), c1, c2, c9, c4, c8, w0)
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9), w0)
  eqidd((s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8), w0)
  fvmptd3(s1, (s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8), (c5[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9)), c3, c4, c8, (Base ` c0), w0)
  rspcdva(s1, (c5[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9)), c4, w0, c3 ∈(Base ` c0), c8 ∈(Base ` c0))
  eleq1d(c8, (Base ` c0), c3, s1 =(c5[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9)))
  sylibr(w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c4, c8 ∈(Base ` c0)), ((s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8): c4 →(Base ` c0)))
  syl(w0, ((s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8): c4 →(Base ` c0)), (s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8)∈(c5[MndHom]c0))
  mhmf((s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c8), c5, c0, c4, (Base ` c0))

  gsumcl(c5, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c9), c4, c6, c1, c7, w0)

blocks.name: gsummptmhm
blocks.content: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum expressed with a mapping. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 8-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptmhm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))), cfv(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c4, cmhm, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), cfsupp, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))), cfv(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ccom(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), w0)
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c1, cfv(c2, c3), c3, c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(c2, cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c2, c5))
  3syl(w0, wfn(c2, c5), wcel(c2, co(c4, cmhm, c0)), wf(c2, c5, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mhmf(c2, c4, c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  ffn(c2, c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  dffn5(hs0, c2, c5)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, c2)
  gsummhm(c0, c2, cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm gsummptmhm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c2 ` c3)))=(c2 `(c4[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(c4[MndHom]c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)[finSupp]c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c2 ` c3))), (c2 `(c4[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))), (c0[gsum](c2 ∘(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, (c2 ∘(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c2 ` c3)), w0)
  fmptco(s0, hs0, c2, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), c1, (c2 ` c3), c3, c5, (c2 ` hs0), w0)
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), w0)
  sylib(w0, c2 =(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2 ` hs0)), c2[Fn]c5)
  3syl(w0, c2[Fn]c5, c2 ∈(c4[MndHom]c0), (c2 : c5 →(Base ` c0)))
  mhmf(c2, c4, c0, c5, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  ffn(c2, c5, (Base ` c0))
  dffn5(hs0, c2, c5)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, c2)
  gsummhm(c0, c2, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c2 ` c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: gsummulglem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ gsummulg and ~ gsummulgz . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummulglem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c4), cfsupp, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsummhm2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4), co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))), c5, c0, c6, c7, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  mpjaod(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c2, cn0))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0))), wcel(c2, cz))
  expcom(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cghm, c0)))
  mulgghm(hs0, c0, c2, c5, c3)
  ghmmhm(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), c0, c0)
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0))), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  ex(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmhm, c0)))
  mulgmhm(hs0, c0, c2, c5, c3)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c2, c3)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4)), c2, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c3, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummulglem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c2[c3]c4)))=(c2[c3](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c4))))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(.g ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c4)[finSupp]c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ∈ Abel ∨ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsummhm2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, (c2[c3]c4), (c2[c3](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c4))), c5, c0, c6, c7, (c2[c3]hs0), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  mpjaod(w0, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0))∈(c0[MndHom]c0), c0 ∈ Abel, c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ Abel →(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0))∈(c0[MndHom]c0)), c2 ∈ ℤ)
  expcom(c2 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ Abel, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0))∈(c0[MndHom]c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0))∈(c0[MndHom]c0), (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0))∈(c0[GrpHom]c0))
  mulgghm(hs0, c0, c2, c5, c3)
  ghmmhm((hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0)), c0, c0)
  syl(w0, (c2 ∈ ℕ0 →(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0))∈(c0[MndHom]c0)), c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ex(c0 ∈ CMnd, c2 ∈ ℕ0, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c2[c3]hs0))∈(c0[MndHom]c0))
  mulgmhm(hs0, c0, c2, c5, c3)
  oveq2(hs0, c4, c2, c3)
  oveq2(hs0, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c4)), c2, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c3, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[c3]c4))
  diff.hs0.c((c2[c3](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: gsumzoppg
blocks.content: The opposite of a group sum is the same as the original. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumzoppg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccntz, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(coppg, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c6, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c5, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4))
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4))))), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))))))
  ex(w0, wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1)))
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, c6, c4)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, c6, c4)), wa(w0, wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), emptycls)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, c6, c4)), co(c2, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, c6, c4))))

thm gsumzinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c0, cgsu, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c6, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c2), cfv(c5, crn(c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c0, cgsu, c2)), co(cfv(coppg, c0), cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), w0)
  gsumzoppg(cfv(coppg, c0), ccom(c1, c2), c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wf(ccom(c1, c2), c6, c3), wf(c1, c3, c3), wf(c2, c6, c3))
  fco(c1, c3, c3, c2, c6)
  3sstr4g(crn(ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c5, crn(ccom(c1, c2))), cima(c1, crn(c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cfv(coppg, c0)), cima(c1, crn(c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(cima(c1, crn(c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cfv(coppg, c0)), cima(c1, crn(c2)))), wcel(c1, co(c0, cmhm, cfv(coppg, c0))), wss(crn(c2), cfv(c5, crn(c2))))
  cntzmhm2(c1, c0, cfv(coppg, c0), crn(c2), c5, crn(c2), cfv(ccntz, cfv(coppg, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, cfv(coppg, c0)))
  eqtri(cfv(c5, crn(ccom(c1, c2))), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cfv(coppg, c0)), cima(c1, crn(c2))), cfv(c5, cima(c1, crn(c2))))
  fveq2i(c5, crn(ccom(c1, c2)), cima(c1, crn(c2)))
  rnco2(c1, c2)
  oppgcntz(c5, cima(c1, crn(c2)), cfv(coppg, c0), c0)
  fsuppco2(c1, c2, c4, universe, c6, c3, c7, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, universe))
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)
  syl(w0, wf(c1, c3, c3), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpinvf(c0, c1, c3)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, c4), c4), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpinvid(c0, c1, c4)
  gsumzmhm(cfv(coppg, c0), c1, c2, c0, c3, c5, c6, c7, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(coppg, c0), cmnd), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpmnd(c0)
  oppgmnd(c0, cfv(coppg, c0))
  4syl(w0, wcel(c1, co(c0, cmhm, cfv(coppg, c0))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, cfv(coppg, c0))), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, cfv(coppg, c0))))
  invoppggim(c0, c1, cfv(coppg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(coppg, c0))
  gimghm(c1, c0, cfv(coppg, c0))
  ghmmhm(c1, c0, cfv(coppg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumzinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](c1 ∘ c2))=(c1 `(c0[gsum]c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(invg ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c6 → c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c2)⊆(c5 ` ran(c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[finSupp]c4)
} = {
  eqtr3d((c0[gsum](c1 ∘ c2)), (c1 `(c0[gsum]c2)), ((oppG ` c0)[gsum](c1 ∘ c2)), w0)
  gsumzoppg((oppG ` c0), (c1 ∘ c2), c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c1 ∘ c2): c6 → c3), (c1 : c3 → c3), (c2 : c6 → c3))
  fco(c1, c3, c3, c2, c6)
  3sstr4g(ran((c1 ∘ c2)), (c5 ` ran((c1 ∘ c2))), (c1 " ran(c2)), ((Cntz `(oppG ` c0))`(c1 " ran(c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1 " ran(c2))⊆((Cntz `(oppG ` c0))`(c1 " ran(c2))), c1 ∈(c0[MndHom](oppG ` c0)), ran(c2)⊆(c5 ` ran(c2)))
  cntzmhm2(c1, c0, (oppG ` c0), ran(c2), c5, ran(c2), (Cntz `(oppG ` c0)))
  eqid((Cntz `(oppG ` c0)))
  eqtri((c5 ` ran((c1 ∘ c2))), ((Cntz `(oppG ` c0))`(c1 " ran(c2))), (c5 `(c1 " ran(c2))))
  fveq2i(c5, ran((c1 ∘ c2)), (c1 " ran(c2)))
  rnco2(c1, c2)
  oppgcntz(c5, (c1 " ran(c2)), (oppG ` c0), c0)
  fsuppco2(c1, c2, c4, universe, c6, c3, c7, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)
  syl(w0, (c1 : c3 → c3), c0 ∈ Grp)
  grpinvf(c0, c1, c3)
  a1i(w0, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ` c4)= c4, c0 ∈ Grp)
  grpinvid(c0, c1, c4)
  gsumzmhm((oppG ` c0), c1, c2, c0, c3, c5, c6, c7, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, (oppG ` c0)∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ Grp)
  grpmnd(c0)
  oppgmnd(c0, (oppG ` c0))
  4syl(w0, c1 ∈(c0[MndHom](oppG ` c0)), c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso](oppG ` c0)), c1 ∈(c0[GrpHom](oppG ` c0)))
  invoppggim(c0, c1, (oppG ` c0))
  eqid((oppG ` c0))
  gimghm(c1, c0, (oppG ` c0))
  ghmmhm(c1, c0, (oppG ` c0))
}

thm gsuminv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4))

blocks.name: gsummptfidminv

thm gsummptfidminv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c0, cgsu, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c6, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c5, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsuminv(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfn, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c2, c5, c3, c6, w0)
  fsuppmptdm(s0, c2, c4, c5, c6, c3, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, universe))
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummptfidminv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](c1 ∘ c2))=(c1 `(c0[gsum]c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(invg ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→ c6 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsuminv(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfn, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c2, c5, c3, c6, w0)
  fsuppmptdm(s0, c2, c4, c5, c6, c3, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)
}

thm gsumsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, co(c1, cof(c2), c3)), co(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, co(c0, cgsu, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cfsupp, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cgsu, co(c1, cof(c2), c3)), co(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, co(c0, cgsu, c3)), co(c0, cgsu, co(c1, cof(cfv(cplusg, c0)), ccom(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3))), co(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c0, cgsu, c3))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, co(c1, cof(cfv(cplusg, c0)), ccom(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3))), co(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c0, cgsu, c3))), co(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3))), w0)
  gsumadd(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), ccom(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wf(ccom(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c6, c4), wf(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4, c4), wf(c3, c6, c4))
  fco(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4, c4, c3, c6)
  fsuppco2(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3, c5, universe, c6, c4, c7, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c5, universe))
  fvexi(c5, c0g, c0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, universe))

thm gsumsnfd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  syl3anc(w0, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ { c1 } ↦ c3))=((# ` { c1 })[(.g ` c0)]c3), c0 ∈ Mnd, { c1 } ∈ Fin, c3 ∈ c4)
  a1i(w0, { c1 } ∈ Fin)
  snfi(c1)
  gsumconstf(s0, c0, { c1 }, c3, c4, (.g ` c0))
  oveq1d((# ` { c1 }), (.g ` c0), c3, nat1, w0)
  syl(w0, (# ` { c1 })= 1, c1 ∈ c5)
  hashsng(c1, c5)
  syl(w0, (1[(.g ` c0)]c3)= c3, c3 ∈ c4)
  mulg1(c3, c4, (.g ` c0), c0)
  eqid((.g ` c0))

}

blocks.name: gsumsnd
blocks.content: Group sum of a singleton, deduction form. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, csn(c1), c2)), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsumsnfd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ { c1 } ↦ c2))= c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c1)→ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsumsnfd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
}

blocks.name: gsumsnf
blocks.content: Group sum of a singleton, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumsnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, csn(c1), c5)), c3))
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c5, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  gsumsnfd(s0, c0, c1, c5, c3, c4, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c5, c3))
  nf3an(s0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  nfv(s0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  nfv(s0, wcel(c1, c2))
  nfel1(s0, c3, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cmnd)
  diff.cmnd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumsnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ { c1 } ↦ c5))= c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c5 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  gsumsnfd(s0, c0, c1, c5, c3, c4, c2, (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  simp1(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  simp3(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  adantl((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), s0 = c1, c5 = c3)
  nf3an(s0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  nfv(s0, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  nfv(s0, c1 ∈ c2)
  nfel1(s0, c3, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cmnd)
  diff.cmnd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: gsumzunsnd

thm gsumzunsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), c4, c5)))

  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(c7, crn(c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c6))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))

  eqeltrd(c3, c6, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c8))))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c8)), wcel(c5, c6))
  fsuppmptdm(s0, c1, cfv(c0g, c0), cun(c2, csn(c8)), c3, c6, universe, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cun(c2, csn(c8)), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(csn(c8), cfn))
  snfi(c8)

  impcom(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c2, csn(c8))), wcel(c3, c6))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c2, csn(c8))), wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6)), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c8))))
  elun(cv(s0), c2, csn(c8))
  jaoi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c8)), wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6)))
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), c2), w0, wcel(c3, c6))

  elsni(cv(s0), c8)
  expcom(wceq(cv(s0), c8), w0, wcel(c3, c6))

  reseq1i(c1, c2, cmpt(s0, cun(c2, csn(c8)), c3))
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c2, csn(c8)), c3), c2), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), wss(c2, cun(c2, csn(c8))))
  ssun1(c2, csn(c8))
  resmpt(s0, c2, cun(c2, csn(c8)), c3)

  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c6))

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5))), diffsc(s0, c0))

  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))

  difid(csn(c3))
  syl(w0, wceq(cdif(csn(c3), csn(c3)), cin(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3))), wss(csn(c3), c1))

  eqcomd(c1, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), w0)

thm gsumdifsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5))

  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)[finSupp](0 ` c0))

  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c3)→ c2 = c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

  ⊣ d(s0, c3)

} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5)), d(s0, c0))
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ { c3 } ↦ c2))), w0)
  gsumsplit2(s0, c0, c1, c2, (c1 \ { c3 }), c4, { c3 }, c6, (0 ` c0), c7, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  syl5reqr(((c1 \ { c3 })⋂ { c3 }), emptycls, ({ c3 } \ { c3 }), w0)
  difid({ c3 })
  syl(w0, ({ c3 } \ { c3 })=((c1 \ { c3 })⋂ { c3 }), { c3 } ⊆ c1)
  snssd(c3, c1, w0)

  eqcomd(c1, ((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 }), w0)
  syl(w0, ((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 })= c1, c3 ∈ c1)

  gsumsnd(s0, c0, c3, c2, c5, c6, c1, w0)

  submcmn2(((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}), c0, (c0[|`s]((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)})), (Cntz ` c0))

  frnd(c1, ((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}), c5, w0)

  anassrs(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, hs0 ≠ c2, (c1 ` hs0)∈((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}))
  eqeltrd((c1 ` hs0), ((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}), c4, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c5 ∧ hs0 ≠ c2)))
  sylan2br(w0, (hs0 ∈ c5 ∧ hs0 ≠ c2), (c1 ` hs0)= c4, hs0 ∈(c5 \ { c2 }))
  eldifsn(hs0, c5, c2)
  suppssr(hs0, c5, { c2 }, c1, c4, c3, c6, universe, w0)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c5 ∧ hs0 ≠ c2), c4 ∈((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}))
  syl(w0, c4 ∈((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}), ((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)})∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  syl2anc(w0, ((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)})∈(SubMnd ` c0), (SubMnd ` c0)∈(Moore ` c3), {(c1 ` c2)} ⊆ c3)
  3syl(w0, (SubMnd ` c0)∈(Moore ` c3), c0 ∈ Mnd, (SubMnd ` c0)∈(ACS ` c3))
  submacs(c0, c3)
  acsmre((SubMnd ` c0), c3)
  snssd((c1 ` c2), c3, w0)
  mrccl((SubMnd ` c0), c3, {(c1 ` c2)}, (mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0)))
  eqid((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0)))
  subm0cl(((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}), c0, c4)
  ffnfv(hs0, c1, c5, ((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}))
  cntzidss(((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}), (Cntz ` c0), ran(c1), c0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
  mpbir2and(w0, c1[finSupp]c4, Fun(c1), (c1[supp]c4)∈ Fin)
  ffund(c1, c5, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, (c1[supp]c4)∈ Fin, { c2 } ∈ Fin, (c1[supp]c4)⊆ { c2 })
  snfi(c2)
  ssfi({ c2 }, (c1[supp]c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c1[finSupp]c4 ↔(Fun(c1)∧(c1[supp]c4)∈ Fin)), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 : c5 → c3), c5 ∈ c6)
  fex(c1, c5, c3, c6)
  a1i(w0, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)
  isfsupp(c1, universe, c4, universe)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[gsum](hs0 ∈ { c2 } ↦(c1 ` hs0)))=(c1 ` c2), c0 ∈ Mnd, c2 ∈ c5, (c1 ` c2)∈ c3)
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  gsumsn(hs0, c0, c2, c5, (c1 ` c2), c3, (c1 ` hs0))
  fveq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(((mrCls `(SubMnd ` c0))` {(c1 ` c2)}))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: gsummptf1o
blocks.content: Re-index a finite group sum using a bijection. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, c4))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c7), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c8, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(c7, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wreu(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c7)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, c4)), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7))), w0)
  gsumf1o(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7), c5, c6, c1, cfn, c3, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  fsuppmptdm(s0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c6, c1, c2, c5, universe, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  sseldd(c2, c5, c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wss(c8, c5))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c6, universe))
  fvexi(c6, c0g, c0)
  sylanbrc(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s1, c3, c7), c3, c1), wral(s1, c3, wcel(c7, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wreu(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c7))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wreu(s1, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c7)))
  f1ompt(s1, s0, cmpt(s1, c3, c7), c3, c1, c7)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c3, c7))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7)), cmpt(s1, c3, c4), w0)
  eqtrd(ccom(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7)), cmpt(s1, c3, c4), cmpt(s1, c3, csb(s0, c7, c2)), w0)
  fmptcos(s1, s0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, c7), c3, c7, c2, c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(s1, c3, w0, wcel(c7, c1))
  eqidd(cmpt(s1, c3, c7), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, csb(s0, c7, c2), c4, w0)
  csbiedf(s0, c7, c2, c4, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  nfv(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wnfc(s0, c4))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), c7), wceq(c2, c4))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c3, c7)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm gsummptf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=(c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c7 → c2 = c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ⊆ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)→ c7 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ ∃!(s1 ∈ c3, s0 = c7))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), (c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)), (c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)∘(s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7))), w0)
  gsumf1o(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7), c5, c6, c1, cfn, c3, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  fsuppmptdm(s0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c6, c1, c2, c5, universe, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  sseldd(c2, c5, c8, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c8 ⊆ c5)
  a1i(w0, c6 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c6, c0g, c0)
  sylanbrc(w0, ((s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7): c3 ↔ c1), ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c7 ∈ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃!(s1 ∈ c3, s0 = c7)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, ∃!(s1 ∈ c3, s0 = c7))
  f1ompt(s1, s0, (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7), c3, c1, c7)
  eqid((s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)∘(s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7)), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), w0)
  eqtrd(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)∘(s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7)), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦[c7 / s0]c2), w0)
  fmptcos(s1, s0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7), c3, c7, c2, c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(s1, c3, w0, c7 ∈ c1)
  eqidd((s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c7), w0)
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, [c7 / s0]c2, c4, w0)
  csbiedf(s0, c7, c2, c4, c1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))
  nfv(s0, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), F/(s0, c4))
  adantl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), s0 = c7, c2 = c4)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c3, c7)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, s1 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: gsummptun
blocks.content: Group sum of a disjoint union, whereas sums are expressed as mappings. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cun(c1, c2), c3)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cun(c1, c2), cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c1, c2))), wcel(c3, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsummptfidmsplit(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2), c3, c1, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cun(c1, c2), w0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummptun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 ⋃ c2)↦ c3))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))[c4](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 ⋃ c2)∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋃ c2))→ c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  gsummptfidmsplit(s0, c0, (c1 ⋃ c2), c3, c1, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  eqidd((c1 ⋃ c2), w0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: gsummpt1n0
blocks.content: If only one summand in a finite group sum is not zero, the whole sum equals this summand. More general version of ~ gsummptif1n0 . (Contributed by AV, 11-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummpt1n0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), csb(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c5, wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), csb(s0, c2, c3), cfv(c1, c2), w0)
  gsumpt(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c1, c5, cfv(cbs, c0), cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), w0)
  ifcld(c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  r19.21bi(s0, c5, w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  mndidcl(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl5eqss(co(c1, csupp, c4), csn(c2), co(cmpt(s0, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), csupp, c4), w0)
  oveq1i(c1, csupp, c4, cmpt(s0, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  suppss2(s0, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), c4, csn(c2), c6, w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c5, csn(c2)))), wceq(cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), c4), wne(cv(s0), c2))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), wne(cv(s0), c2))
  eldifsni(cv(s0), c5, c2)
  ifnefalse(cv(s0), c2, c3, c4)
  fvmptd3(hs0, c1, c2, csb(s0, c2, c3), c5, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  eqtri(c1, cmpt(hs0, c5, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cmpt(s0, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), cif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfcv(hs0, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  nfif(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  ifbieq1d(c3, c4, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  eqtrd(cif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), csb(s0, c2, c3), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  iftrue(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(csb(s0, c2, c3), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c2, c5), wral(s0, c5, wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  rspcsbela(s0, c2, c5, c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm gsummpt1n0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)=[c2 / s0]c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s0 = c2, c3, c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c5, c3 ∈(Base ` c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum]c1), [c2 / s0]c3, (c1 ` c2), w0)
  gsumpt(c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c0), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c1, c5, (Base ` c0), if(s0 = c2, c3, c4), w0)
  ifcld(c3, c4, (Base ` c0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), s0 = c2)
  r19.21bi(s0, c5, w0, c3 ∈(Base ` c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c5, c4 ∈(Base ` c0))
  syl(w0, c4 ∈(Base ` c0), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  mndidcl(c0, c4, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl5eqss((c1[supp]c4), { c2 }, ((s0 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s0 = c2, c3, c4))[supp]c4), w0)
  oveq1i(c1, csupp, c4, (s0 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s0 = c2, c3, c4)))
  suppss2(s0, c5, if(s0 = c2, c3, c4), c4, { c2 }, c6, w0)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c5 \ { c2 })), if(s0 = c2, c3, c4)= c4, s0 ≠ c2)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c5 \ { c2 }), s0 ≠ c2)
  eldifsni(s0, c5, c2)
  ifnefalse(s0, c2, c3, c4)
  fvmptd3(hs0, c1, c2, [c2 / s0]c3, c5, if(hs0 = c2,[hs0 / s0]c3, c4), (Base ` c0), w0)
  eqtri(c1, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ if(hs0 = c2,[hs0 / s0]c3, c4)), (s0 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s0 = c2, c3, c4)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c5, if(s0 = c2, c3, c4), if(hs0 = c2,[hs0 / s0]c3, c4))
  nfcv(hs0, if(s0 = c2, c3, c4))
  nfif(s0, [hs0 / s0]c3, c4, hs0 = c2)
  nfv(s0, hs0 = c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  ifbieq1d(c3, c4, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0, s0 = c2, hs0 = c2)
  eqeq1(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  eqtrd(if(hs0 = c2,[hs0 / s0]c3, c4), [c2 / s0]c3, [hs0 / s0]c3, hs0 = c2)
  iftrue([hs0 / s0]c3, c4, hs0 = c2)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, [c2 / s0]c3 ∈(Base ` c0), c2 ∈ c5, ∀(s0 ∈ c5, c3 ∈(Base ` c0)))
  rspcsbela(s0, c2, c5, c3, (Base ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c([c2 / s0]c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(if(s0 = c2, c3, c4))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: gsummptif1n0
blocks.content: If only one summand in a finite group sum is not zero, the whole sum equals this summand. (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptif1n0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, cif(c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, csb(s0, c6, c2), w0)
  gsummpt1n0(s0, c0, c1, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  ralrimivw(s0, c4, w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl(w0, wceq(csb(s0, c6, c2), c2), wcel(c6, c4))
  csbconstg(s0, c6, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummptif1n0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)= c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c4 ↦ if(s0 = c6, c2, c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum]c1), c2, [c6 / s0]c2, w0)
  gsummpt1n0(s0, c0, c1, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  ralrimivw(s0, c4, w0, c2 ∈(Base ` c0))
  syl(w0, [c6 / s0]c2 = c2, c6 ∈ c4)
  csbconstg(s0, c6, c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: gsummptcl
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum over a finite set as map. (Contributed by AV, 29-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  gsumcl(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3, cfv(c0g, c0), c1, cfn, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  sylib(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  fmpt(s0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  fndmfifsupp(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cfv(c0g, c0), c1, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  fnmpt(s0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  fvexd(c0g, c0, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummptcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))∈ c3)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  gsumcl(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c3, (0 ` c0), c1, cfn, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  sylib(w0, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2): c1 → c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  fmpt(s0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  fndmfifsupp((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (0 ` c0), c1, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)[Fn]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  fnmpt(s0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  fvexd(c0g, c0, w0)
}

blocks.name: gsummptfif1o
blocks.content: Re-index a finite group sum as map, using a bijection. (Contributed by by AV, 23-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptfif1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c4, wcel(c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c2, c6, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  gsumf1o(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c0), c4, cfn, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  fdmfifsupp(c1, cfv(c0g, c0), c4, c3, universe, w0)
  sylib(w0, wf(c1, c4, c3), wral(s0, c4, wcel(c5, c3)))
  fmpt(s0, c4, c5, c3, c1)
  fvexd(c0g, c0, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummptfif1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum](c1 ∘ c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c3))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c4 ↦ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c6 ↔ c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {

  eqid((0 ` c0))
  fdmfifsupp(c1, (0 ` c0), c4, c3, universe, w0)
  sylib(w0, (c1 : c4 → c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c3))
  fmpt(s0, c4, c5, c3, c1)
  fvexd(c0g, c0, w0)
}

blocks.name: gsummptfzcl
blocks.content: Closure of a finite group sum over a finite set of sequential integers as map. (Contributed by AV, 14-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptfzcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, co(c5, cfz, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3, cfv(cseq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c4), w0)
  gsumval2(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4, c3, cmnd, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), co(c5, cfz, c4), c3), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl5bb(w0, wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)), wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), co(c5, cfz, c4), c3), wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c3))
  feq2d(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c3, co(c5, cfz, c4), w0)
  seqcl(hs0, hs1, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c4, c3, w0)
  ffvelrnd(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0), c3, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c5, cfz, c4))))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c5, cfz, c4))), wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c3), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c5, cfz, c4)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  fmpt(s0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c5, cfz, c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c5, cfz, c4), c1, w0)
  eqcomd(co(c5, cfz, c4), c1, w0)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c3), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  mndcl(c0, cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummptfzcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))∈ c3)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(c5[...]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), c3, (seq(c5((+ ` c0),(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))` c4), w0)
  gsumval2(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c5, (+ ` c0), c4, c3, cmnd, w0)
  mpbid(w0, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2):(c5[...]c4)→ c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  syl5bb(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2):(c5[...]c4)→ c3), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2): c1 → c3))
  feq2d((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c1, c3, (c5[...]c4), w0)
  seqcl(hs0, hs1, c5, (+ ` c0), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c4, c3, w0)
  ffvelrnd((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), hs0, c3, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c5[...]c4)))
  sylib((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c5[...]c4)), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2): c1 → c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c5[...]c4), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  fmpt(s0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  biimpa(w0, hs0 ∈(c5[...]c4), hs0 ∈ c1)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c5[...]c4), c1, w0)
  eqcomd((c5[...]c4), c1, w0)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c3, c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c3)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c3)
  mndcl(c0, hs0, c3, hs1, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
