thm gsum2dlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), wi(w0, wrel(c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), wi(w0, wss(cdm(c1), c6)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsc(s1, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c3)), diffsw(s1, w0))
  gsumcl2(c0, cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), c3, c4, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), universe, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3, w0)
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cima(c1, csn(cv(s1)))), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1))
  syl5eqel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3, cfv(c2, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1)))
  ffvelrnda(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  ssfid(co(cmpt(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), csupp, c4), crn(co(c2, csupp, c4)), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(crn(co(c2, csupp, c4)), cfn), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c4), cfn))
  fsuppimpd(c2, c4, w0)
  rnfi(co(c2, csupp, c4))
  suppss2(s0, cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c4, crn(co(c2, csupp, c4)), universe, w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), crn(co(c2, csupp, c4)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c4), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cdif(c1, co(c2, csupp, c4))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cima(c1, csn(cv(s1))), crn(co(c2, csupp, c4)))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cdif(c1, co(c2, csupp, c4))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cima(c1, csn(cv(s1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), crn(co(c2, csupp, c4))))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1), wn(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), co(c2, csupp, c4)))))
  anim12i(wcel(cv(s0), cima(c1, csn(cv(s1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), crn(co(c2, csupp, c4)))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1), wn(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), co(c2, csupp, c4))))

blocks.name: gsum2d
blocks.content: Write a sum over a two-dimensional region as a double sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 8-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsum2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))

  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c5))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), co(c0, cgsu, cres(c1, cres(c3, cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5))))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), w0)

  ssind(co(c1, csupp, c5), c3, cxp(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), universe), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(co(c1, csupp, c5), cxp(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), universe)), wrel(co(c1, csupp, c5)))
  sylc(w0, wrel(co(c1, csupp, c5)), wss(co(c1, csupp, c5), c3), wrel(c3))
  relss(co(c1, csupp, c5), c3)
  syl6ss(co(c1, csupp, c5), cxp(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), universe), cxp(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), crn(co(c1, csupp, c5))), wrel(co(c1, csupp, c5)))
  relssdmrn(co(c1, csupp, c5))
  ax-mp(wss(cxp(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), crn(co(c1, csupp, c5))), cxp(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), universe)), wss(crn(co(c1, csupp, c5)), universe))
  ssv(crn(co(c1, csupp, c5)))
  xpss2(crn(co(c1, csupp, c5)), universe, cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)))
  df-res(c3, cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)))), w0)

  sstrd(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), c2, cdm(c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cdm(co(c1, csupp, c5)), cdm(c3)), wss(co(c1, csupp, c5), c3))

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ gsum2d2 : show the function is finitely supported. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)

thm gsum2d2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1))))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c3)), wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c3)), wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccmn)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c3)), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c3)), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c3)), diffsc(s1, c5))
  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c3), wfun(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)), wcel(co(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), csupp, c3), cfn))
  a1i(w0, wfun(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: gsum2d2
blocks.content: Write a group sum over a two-dimensional region as a double sum. Note that ` C ( j ) ` is a function of ` j ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsum2d2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1))))), wceq(c3, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))))), w0)
  gsum2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c1, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), c4, c5, universe, c6, w0)

  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), universe), wcel(c2, c7))
  snex(cv(s0))
  xpexg(csn(cv(s0)), universe, c2, c7)
  iunexg(s0, c1, c6, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe)

  mpbir(wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  relxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)
  reliun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  ssrdv(hs2, cdm(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), c1, w0)
  syl5bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), cdm(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wex(hs3, wcel(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))))
  eldm2(hs3, cv(hs2), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  exlimdv(hs3, w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  syl5bi(w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))

  ex(w0, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs2), c1, cv(s0), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))
  ad2antrl(w0, wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s0)))
  opth1(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(hs2)
  vex(hs3)
  simprrl(w0, wceq(cop(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  sylib(w0, wf(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), c4), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(c3, c4))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c2, w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  fmpt2x(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  gsum2d2lem(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c5, c4, c0, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))), cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), w0)
  syl5eq(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))), cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))), w0)
  cbvmpt(hs0, s0, c1, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))))
  nfov(s0, c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, cgsu)
  nfmpt(s0, hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))
  nfima(s0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0)))
  nfiu1(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  nfcv(s0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  nfov(s0, cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfmpt21(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(hs0, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)))))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))), cmpt(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  mpteq12dv(hs1, cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), cima(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))

  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c2, w0, wcel(c3, c6))

  mpt2eq3dva(s1, s0, c4, c5, c3, co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), w0)

  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s1, c4, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c5)))

blocks.content: Write a group sum over a cartesian product as a double sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)

thm gsumxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cxp(c2, c3), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfsupp, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), w0)
  gsum2d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cxp(c2, c3), c4, c5, universe, c6, w0)
  xpexd(c2, c3, c6, c7, w0)
  a1i(w0, wrel(cxp(c2, c3)))
  relxp(c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, wss(cdm(cxp(c2, c3)), c2))
  dmxpss(c2, c3)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c2, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), cmpt(s1, c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  mpteq1d(s1, cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl5eq(cima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), c3, crn(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  df-ima(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))
  syl6eq(crn(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))), c3, crn(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  rneqd(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl5eq(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3), cxp(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cin(c3, universe)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqtri(cres(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0))), cxp(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cin(c3, universe)), cin(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), universe)))
  df-res(cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))
  inxp(c2, c3, csn(cv(s0)), universe)
  xpeq12d(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), cin(c3, universe), csn(cv(s0)), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cin(c2, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s0))), wss(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  snssd(cv(s0), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sseqin2(csn(cv(s0)), c2)
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cin(c3, universe), c3))
  inv1(c3)
  ax-mp(wceq(crn(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), c3), wne(csn(cv(s0)), emptycls))
  snnz(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  rnxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.cima.s(s1, cxp(c2, c3), csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm gsumxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c3 ↦(s0[c1]s1))))))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 :(c2 × c3)→ c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[finSupp]c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c3 ↦(s0[c1]s1)))))), d(s0, c6))
  eqtrd((c0[gsum]c1), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c3 ↦(s0[c1]s1))))), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[gsum](s1 ∈((c2 × c3)" { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1))))), w0)
  gsum2d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, (c2 × c3), c4, c5, universe, c6, w0)
  xpexd(c2, c3, c6, c7, w0)
  a1i(w0, Rel((c2 × c3)))
  relxp(c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, dom((c2 × c3))⊆ c2)
  dmxpss(c2, c3)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[gsum](s1 ∈((c2 × c3)" { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1)))), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c3 ↦(s0[c1]s1)))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c2, (c0[gsum](s1 ∈((c2 × c3)" { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1))), (c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c3 ↦(s0[c1]s1))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, (s1 ∈((c2 × c3)" { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1)), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(s0[c1]s1)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  mpteq1d(s1, ((c2 × c3)" { s0 }), (s0[c1]s1), c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  syl5eq(((c2 × c3)" { s0 }), c3, ran(((c2 × c3)|` { s0 })), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  df-ima((c2 × c3), { s0 })
  syl6eq(ran(((c2 × c3)|` { s0 })), c3, ran(({ s0 } × c3)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  rneqd(((c2 × c3)|` { s0 }), ({ s0 } × c3), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  syl5eq(((c2 × c3)|` { s0 }), ({ s0 } × c3), ((c2 ⋂ { s0 })×(c3 ⋂ 𝕌)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  eqtri(((c2 × c3)|` { s0 }), ((c2 ⋂ { s0 })×(c3 ⋂ 𝕌)), ((c2 × c3)⋂({ s0 } × 𝕌)))
  df-res((c2 × c3), { s0 })
  inxp(c2, c3, { s0 }, universe)
  xpeq12d((c2 ⋂ { s0 }), (c3 ⋂ 𝕌), { s0 }, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  sylib((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (c2 ⋂ { s0 })= { s0 }, { s0 } ⊆ c2)
  snssd(s0, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c2)
  sseqin2({ s0 }, c2)
  a1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (c3 ⋂ 𝕌)= c3)
  inv1(c3)
  ax-mp(ran(({ s0 } × c3))= c3, { s0 } ≠ ∅)
  snnz(s0)
  vex(s0)
  rnxp({ s0 }, c3)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.cima.s(s1, (c2 × c3), { s0 })
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.csn.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: gsumcom
blocks.content: Commute the arguments of a double sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpo(s1, s0, c2, c1, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c8, cv(s1))))), wceq(c3, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  gsumcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c7, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, c7))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))=(c0[gsum](s1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→ c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ ¬ s0[c8]s1))→ c3 = c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  gsumcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c7, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c7)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)↔(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)))
  ancom(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2)
}

blocks.name: prdsgsum
blocks.content: Finite commutative sums in a product structure are taken componentwise. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdsgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), cmpt(s1, c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c5, cprds, cmpt(s1, c2, c4)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))

thm prdsgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))=(s1 ∈ c2 ↦(c4[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))))
  ⊣ c0 =(c5[×](s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c7 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c9)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c10)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)→ c4 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))→ c3 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))[finSupp]c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtr4d((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))), (s1 ∈ c2 ↦(c4[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))), (s1 ∈ c2 ↦((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))` s1)), w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))=(s1 ∈ c2 ↦((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))` s1)), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))[Fn]c2)
  prdsbasfn((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))), c2, c0, c5, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), (Base ` c0), c10, c8, w0)
  ffnd((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), c2, ccmn, w0)
  gsumcl(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)), (Base ` c0), c7, c1, c9, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), (Base ` c0), w0)
  dffn5f(s1, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))), c2)
  nfov(s1, c0, cgsu, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s1, cgsu)
  nfmpt(s1, s0, c1, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfmpt1(s1, c2, c3)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c2, (c4[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))` s1), w0)
  eqtr3d((c4[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))` s1), (c4[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` s1))), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  oveq2d(c4, cgsu, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` s1)), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  mpteq2dva(s0, c1, ((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` s1), c3, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  syl2an2r((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2), s0 ∈ c1, ((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` s1)= c3, s1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c6)
  fvmpt2(s1, c2, c3, c6, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  eqid((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  gsummhm2(s0, hs0, c4, c1, ((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` s1), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))` s1), (Base ` c0), c0, c7, c9, (hs0 ` s1), (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  prdscmnd(c0, c5, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), c2, c8, c10, w0)

  prdspjmhm(hs0, (Base ` c0), s1, c0, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), c5, c2, c8, c10, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))

  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c10)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c2, ((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4): c2 → Mnd))

  cmnmnd(c4)
  oveq2d(c0, cmhm, ((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)` s1), c4, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2), ((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)` s1)= c4, s1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ CMnd)
  simpr(w0, s1 ∈ c2)
  fvmpt2(s1, c2, c4, ccmn, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  eqid((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  adantlr(w0, s1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c1, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)∈(Base ` c0))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)∈(Base ` c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c6))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c3 ∈ c6)
  an32s(w0, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c6)
  anassrs(w0, s1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c6)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, ((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)∈(Base ` c0)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c6)))
  prdsbasmpt2(s1, c2, c3, (Base ` c0), c6, c0, c5, c4, c10, c8, ccmn, w0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, w0, c4 ∈ CMnd)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c2, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))[finSupp]c7)
  fveq1(hs0, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), s1)
  fveq1(hs0, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))), s1)
  diff.ccmn.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cgsu.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, s1 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)` s1))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))` s1))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))

  diff.hs0.c((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))

blocks.name: pwsgsum
blocks.content: Finite commutative sums in a power structure are taken componentwise. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)

thm pwsgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  prdsgsum(s0, s1, co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4))), c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(csca, c4), c5, cfv(c0g, co(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4)))), c7, c8, universe, w0)
  oveq2i(cfv(csca, c4), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(c4)), cmpt(s1, c2, c4))
  fconstmpt(s1, c2, c4)
